#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <vector>
#include <list>
#include <algorithm>

using namespace std;

int main() {
	#ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
		freopen("input.txt", "r", stdin);
	#endif
	int a,b,c;
	int ta,tb,tc;
	int pa,pb,pc;
	long long x;
	
	cin>>a>>b>>c;
	cin>>ta>>tb>>tc;
	cin>>pa>>pb>>pc;
	cin>>x;
	
	long long res = 0;
	long long perCost = a*pa + b*pb + c*pc;
	if(perCost == 0) {
		cout<<"0"<<endl;
		return 0;
	}
	while(ta>=a && tb>=b && tc>=c) {
		res++;
		ta -= a;
		tb -= b;
		tc -= c;
	}
	while((ta>0 && a!=0) || (tb>0 && b!=0) || (tc>0 && c!=0)) {
		long long t1 = 0;
		if(ta >= a) {
			ta -= a;
		} else {
			t1 += pa*(a-ta);
			ta = 0;
		}
		
		if(tb >= b) {
			tb -= b;
		} else {
			t1 += pb*(b-tb);
			tb = 0;
		}
		
		if(tc >= c) {
			tc -= c;
		} else {
			t1 += pc*(c-tc);
			tc = 0;
		}
		
		if(t1 == perCost)
			break;
		if(t1 > x)
			break;
		res++;
		x -= t1;
	}
	res += x/perCost;
	cout<<res<<endl;
	return 0;
}
